scripts.bin:test: node --loader ts-node/esm src/bin.ts --compact --data --output data/output-js.json data/EU-ground-temperature.grib2 && gzip -kf data/output-js.json
scripts.bin:test:raw: node --loader ts-node/esm src/bin.ts --data --output data/output-js-raw.json data/EU-ground-temperature.grib2 && gzip -kf data/output-js-raw.json
scripts.bin:test:all: yarn bin:test && yarn bin:test:raw && yarn data:size
scripts.bin:preview: node dist/bin.js --compact --data --output data/output-js.json data/EU-ground-temperature.grib2 && gzip -kf data/output-js.json
scripts.bin:preview:raw: node dist/bin.js --data --output data/output-js-raw.json data/EU-ground-temperature.grib2 && gzip -kf data/output-js-raw.json
scripts.bin:preview:all: yarn build && yarn bin:preview && yarn bin:preview:raw && yarn data:size
